titleStmt.title: His Maiesties letter to the Lord Maior and aldermen of the citie of London with the humble petition of the knights, ministers, gentry, free-holders and other inhabitants of the county of Leicester to the King : also the resolution of the whole county of Essex presented to the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament and commanded by the Lords to be forthwith printed and published.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Hewer and W. Moulton,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.

Charles R. to our trusty and well beloved, the Lord Major, aldermen and sheriffes of our citie of London -- The humle peititon of the knights, ministres, gentry, free-holders, and many thousands of the inhabitants of the county of the captaines and souldiers, the trained bands and other inhabitants of the county of Essex -- The Lords answer to the Essex petition.
